message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $120 is a good price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. How about $125? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your willingness to pay a bit more. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $135.
I'm still not comfortable with $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $127.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $132.50.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $129. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your frustration, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $131.
I'm really close to walking away and buying from John, but I'll make one last offer. I'll meet you at $128. If you're not willing to sell it to me for that price, I'm out of here.
